abstract: A music item that represents a track.
rawMarkdown:

source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/MusicKit/Track
crawled: 2025-12-01T09:50:24Z

# Track

**Enumeration**

A music item that represents a track.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Track
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **Track.musicVideo(_:)**: A track that corresponds to a music video.
- **Track.song(_:)**: A track that corresponds to a song.

## Instance Properties

- **albumTitle**: The title of the album the track appears on.
- **albums**: The track’s associated albums.
- **artistName**: The artist’s name.
- **artistURL**: The artist’s URL.
- **artists**: The track’s associated artists.
- **artwork**: The artwork for the track.
- **contentRating**: The rating of the content.
- **discNumber**: The disc number of the track.
- **duration**: The duration of the track.
- **editorialNotes**: The editorial notes for the track.
- **genreNames**: The names of the track’s associated genres.
- **genres**: The track’s associated genres.
- **id**: The unique identifier for the track.
- **isrc**: The International Standard Recording Code (ISRC) for the track.
- **lastPlayedDate**: The date when the user last played the track on this device.
- **libraryAddedDate**: The date when the user added the track to the library.
- **playCount**: The number of times the user played the track.
- **playParameters**: The parameters to use to play the track.
- **previewAssets**: The preview assets for the track.
- **releaseDate**: The release date (or expected for pre-release) of the track.
- **title**: The title of the track.
- **trackNumber**: The track’s number in the album’s track list.
- **url**: The URL for the track.
- **workName**: For classical music only, the name of the associated work.

## Default Implementations

- **MusicLibraryRequestable Implementations**

## Music Items

- **Album**: A music item that represents an album.
- **Artist**: A music item that represents an artist.
- **Curator**: A music item that represents a curator.
- **Genre**: A music item that represents a genre.
- **MusicVideo**: A music item that represents a music video.
- **Playlist**: A music item that represents a playlist.
- **RadioShow**: A music item that represents a radio show.
- **RecordLabel**: A music item that represents a record label.
- **Song**: A music item that represents a song.
- **Station**: A music item that represents a station.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Identifiable
- MusicItem
- MusicLibraryAddable
- MusicLibraryRequestable
- MusicPlaylistAddable
- MusicPropertyContainer
- MusicRecentlyPlayedRequestable
- PlayableMusicItem
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
